channel.title: Tokkul
channel.description:
I've maked a tokkul shop but all of the items are 0 tokkuls worth. If I change the price it don't works, cause it's for coins I guess. how to change the tokkul value?
please help

item.title: Tokkul
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

Please use the search bar i have explained this more then 5 times now.

Well go into ShopAssistant.java

Look for something like

getSpecialItemValue

and under it you should see something like

case XXX:
return XXX;

add one underrneath the return

case ITEMID:
return AMOUNT;

Read full topic

item.title: Tokkul
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

uhm okay but where do I’ve to place a item tokkul id?

Code :

public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) { switch (id) { case 6889: case 6914: case 15604: case 15606: case 15600: case 15610: case 15612: case 15616: case 15618: return 100; case 6916: case 6918: case 6920: case 6922: case 6924: return 50; case 11663: case 11664: case 11665: case 8842: return 30; case 8839: case 8840: case 15602: case 15608: case 15614: case 15620: case 19272: case 19275: case 19278: case 19281: case 19284: case 19287: case 19290: case 19293: case 19296: case 19299: case 19302: case 19305: case 13107: case 13109: case 13111: case 13113: case 13115: case 13858: case 13861: case 13864: case 13870: case 13873: case 13876: case 13896: case 13884: case 13890: case 13887: case 13893: case 13905: case 13867: return 75; case 13883: case 13879: return 1; case 10499: return 20; case 8845: return 5; case 8846: return 10; case 8847: return 15; case 8848: return 20; case 8849: case 8850: return 25; case 10551: case 10531: case 10533: case 10534: case 10537: return 50; case 6570: return 35; case 11730: case 13902: case 13899: return 150; case 11696: case 11698: case 11700: return 200; case 11694: return 350; case 6585: return 15; case 15051: return 300; case 11235: return 200; case 4151: return 150; case 15039: case 18349: case 18351: case 18353: case 18355: case 18357: return 1000; case 15272: return 10; } return 0; }

Read full topic

item.title: Tokkul
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You have to set the special value in shopassistant.java

Read full topic

item.title: Tokkul
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

For PI it should be in shop assistant.java, and you need to tell it to use tokkul.

Read full topic
